articles.title: US inflation rises to 3.2% in February - Financial Times
articles.description: Unexpected increase set to be scrutinised by Fed as it weighs interest rate cuts
articles.content:
US inflation increased unexpectedly to 3.2 per cent last month, in data set to be scrutinised by the US Federal Reserve as it decides when to reduce interest rates.
